results.title: Chronopharmacology of simvastatin on hyperlipidaemia in high-fat diet-fed obese mice
results.text_hl: The chronopharmacology refers to the utilization of physiological circadian rhythms to optimize the administration time of drugs, thus increasing their efficacy and safety, or reducing adverse effects. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ is one of the most widely prescribed drugs for the treatment of hypercholesterolaemia, @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Li H, Rabearivony A, Zhang W, Chen S, An X, Liu C. Chronopharmacology of simvastatin on hyperlipidaemia in high-fat diet-fed obese mice J Cell Mol Med. 2020 Sep;24(18):11024-11029. PMID: 32767644

results.title: [Economic analysis of secondary prevention of coronary heart disease with simvastatin (Zocor) in Germany].
results.text_hl: The 4S Study has demonstrated the clinical effectiveness in the secondary prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@. METHOD: Based on the health economics data of this study, we undertook a cost-effectiveness analysis of the secondary prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in Germany.

citations.NLM: Obermann K, Mattias Graf, Schulenburg JM, Mautner GC. [Economic analysis of secondary prevention of coronary heart disease with simvastatin (Zocor) in Germany]. Med Klin (Munich). 1997 Nov 15;92(11):686-94. PMID: 9480401

results.title: Pleiotropic effects of ezetimibe/simvastatin vs. high dose simvastatin.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: In the setting of stable @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@), it is not known if the pleiotropic effects of @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ reduction differ between combined @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and high-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ alone.

results.title: Increasing doses of simvastatin versus combined ezetimibe/simvastatin: effect on circulating endothelial progenitor cells.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: We sought to compare, in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with stable @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@ and with a low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C) >70 mg/dL on treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 20 mg, the effects on EPCs by increasing @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to 80 mg versus adding ezetimibe 10 mg.
